footer.history_desc: Nova Health Innovation Hospital Founded in 1995 by a visionary group of medical professionals and business leaders, Nova Health Innovation Hospital was established with the mission to create a cutting-edge medical institution that prioritizes quality patient care. From its inception as a mid-sized hospital, Nova Health Innovation has evolved into one of the most renowned medical centers in the country, known for its advanced technology and compassionate care.
footer.address: 123 Innovation Avenue Srisuk Subdistrict Sathorn District Bangkok 10120 Thailand

icon_btn.BNSDC: Brain and Nervous System Disorders Center

history.1: Founding: Nova Health Innovation Hospital was established in 1995 by a group of visionary medical professionals and business leaders with a mission to create a cutting-edge hospital focused on quality patient care.
history.2: Core Mission: The hospital aims to provide top-tier medical services using the latest technologies and innovative research to enhance patient treatment.
history.3: Growth and Expansion: Initially a mid-sized hospital, it expanded over the years, increasing its capacity to treat patients and improve services continually.
history.4: Technology Integration: The hospital pioneered the use of advanced technologies in treating various conditions, such as minimally invasive surgery, cardiology, and cancer therapy.
history.5: Research and Development: Continuous investment in research and development has led to the creation of new medical innovations at the hospital.
history.6: Medical Staff Development: Emphasizing the ongoing education and skill development of medical staff, the hospital ensures they are equipped with the latest knowledge and techniques.
history.7: Community Engagement: The hospital fosters strong relationships with the community to build a healthier and more sustainable society.
history.8: Global Network Expansion: Nova Health Innovation Hospital has established partnerships with leading hospitals and medical centers worldwide to exchange knowledge and technologies.
history.9: Comprehensive Services: The hospital offers comprehensive healthcare services, including diagnosis, treatment, and rehabilitation.
history.10: Patient Trust: Known for its high-quality services and compassionate care, Nova Health Innovation Hospital has earned the trust of patients both locally and internationally.

AboutUs.head: About Us
AboutUs.text-1: Nova Health Innovation Hospital was established in 1995 with the ambition to become the most advanced hospital in the region. Founded by a visionary team of medical professionals and business leaders, our hospital is dedicated to delivering high-quality patient care using the latest technology and innovative practices.
AboutUs.text-2: At Nova, we prioritize continuous research and development to create cutting-edge medical innovations that meet the evolving needs of our patients. We have integrated advanced technologies in our treatments, such as minimally invasive surgery, cardiology, and cancer therapy, ensuring our patients receive the safest and most effective care available.
AboutUs.text-3: We are committed to building strong relationships with our community and expanding our network with leading hospitals worldwide to exchange knowledge and technology. Nova Health Innovation Hospital has earned the trust of patients both locally and internationally by offering comprehensive services from diagnosis and treatment to rehabilitation, all grounded in excellence and compassionate care.
